events.name: kill_in_slide
events.comment: Player killed enemy while being in slide

events.name: teammate_protected
events.comment: Player saved teammate from shield bearer or specop AI

events.name: protected_by_teammate
events.comment: Player saved by teammate from shield bearer or specop AI

events.name: ctf_flag_return
events.comment: Flag returned to base by defenders

events.name: ptb_bomb_pickup
events.comment: Player team picked up the bomb

events.name: ptb_round_win_bomb_exploded
events.comment: Player team won the round by exploding the bomb

events.name: ptb_round_loose_bomb_exploded
events.comment: Player team lost the round by exploding the bomb

events.name: headshots_in_a_row_2
events.comment: Player made 2 headshots in a row

events.name: headshots_in_a_row_3
events.comment: Player made 3 headshots in a row

events.name: headshots_in_a_row_4
events.comment: Player made 4 headshots in a row

events.name: headshots_in_a_row_5
events.comment: Player made 5 headshots in a row

events.name: grenade_kills_in_a_row_1
events.comment: Player made 2 grenade kills in a row

events.name: grenade_kills_in_a_row_2
events.comment: Player made 3 grenade kills in a row

events.name: grenade_kills_in_a_row_3
events.comment: Player made 5 grenade kills in a row

events.name: melee_kills_in_a_row_1
events.comment: Player made 2 melee kills in a row

events.name: melee_kills_in_a_row_2
events.comment: Player made 3 melee kills in a row

events.name: melee_kills_in_a_row_3
events.comment: Player made 5 melee kills in a row

events.name: defibrillator_kill
events.comment: Player made a kill using a defibrillator

events.name: in_knock_back_kill
events.comment: Player made a kill while being in knock back

events.name: two_at_once_kill
events.comment: Player made 2 kills with one bullet

events.name: double_kill
events.comment: Player made 2 kills in a row

events.name: pvp_triple_kill
events.comment: Player made 3 kills in a row

events.name: dmn_defend_kills_1
events.comment: Player was on his core and killed enemy

events.name: dmn_attack_kills_1
events.comment: Player killed enemy on enemy core

events.name: cpu_damage_taken
events.comment: when at least 1 cube is destroyed

events.name: doing_cpu_damage
events.comment: when at least 1 cube is destroyed

keys.name: totalKills
keys.info: Total kills for player in match

keys.name: totalDeaths
keys.info: Total deaths of player in match

events.name: assist
events.comment: Player has assisted in killing an enemy

keys.name: totalAssists
keys.info: Total assists for user it match

events.name: headshot
events.comment: Player has gained a killed with a headshot. Fired alongside kill event

keys.name: headshotsInRound
keys.info: Total headshots for user in current round

keys.name: num_of_rounds
keys.info: Total number of rounds in current match

keys.name: winningTeam
keys.info: The team that won the round (CT/T)

keys.name: bomb
keys.info: Bomb status

events.name: bomb_planted
events.comment: A bomb has been planted (by any player)

events.name: weapon_acquired
events.comment: Player acquires new weapon (either buy or picks up)

enum.name: menu
enum.info: The player entered the game’s menu

keys.name: count
keys.info: Number of deaths

keys.name: count
keys.info: Number of times this kill type happened in the match

events.name: assist
events.comment: When you assists killing another champion

keys.name: count
keys.info: Number of times this event happened in the match

events.name: championSelected
events.comment: The selected champion, fires at the beginning of the game.

keys.name: name
keys.info: The name of the selected champion

keys.name: count
keys.info: Amount of enemy minions killed by the player

keys.name: count
keys.info: Amount of neutral minions killed by the player

events.name: goldChanged
events.comment: Fires whenever the amount of gold changes

keys.name: count
keys.info: Gold amount

events.name: usedAbility
events.comment: Fires when the player actually activated the ability.

keys.name: type
keys.info: Ability number (between 1-4, 4 for ult).

events.name: announcer
events.comment: Fires whenever an announcement is being made.

keys.name: name
keys.info: Announcement

events.name: game_state_changed
events.comment: The user starts playing, spectating or stops playing (no game available to play or spectate). Note that simply bringing the menu is not enough to trigger the ‘idle’ event – the active game (played or spectated) must be closed.

keys.name: game_state
keys.info: One of ‘playing’, ‘idle’ or ‘spectating’. Idle is when there isn’t a game being played or spectated.

keys.name: match_state
keys.info: The internal match state.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_WAIT_FOR_PLAYERS_TO_LOAD
enum.info: Shown with the pre-game “Waiting for loaders” screen.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_HERO_SELECTION
enum.info: Shown with the hero selection screen.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_PRE_GAME
enum.info: Shown when the game begins, before the battle horn is heard.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_GAME_IN_PROGRESS
enum.info: Shown with the start game battle horn.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_POST_GAME
enum.info: Shown with the in-game post-game screen.

keys.name: match_id
keys.info: The id of the match (not available for ‘idle’).

keys.name: player_steam_id
keys.info: The Steam id of the local player (not available for ‘idle’).

events.name: game_match_state_changed
events.comment: The internal game match state has changed.

keys.name: match_state
keys.info: The internal match state.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_WAIT_FOR_PLAYERS_TO_LOAD
enum.info: Shown with the pre-game “Waiting for loaders” screen.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_HERO_SELECTION
enum.info: Shown with the hero selection screen.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_PRE_GAME
enum.info: Shown when the game begins, before the battle horn is heard.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_GAME_IN_PROGRESS
enum.info: Shown with the start game battle horn.

enum.name: DOTA_GAMERULES_STATE_POST_GAME
enum.info: Shown with the in-game post-game screen.

events.name: match_detected
events.comment: As soon as 10 players accepted a match (just after the ‘Accept Match’ prompt).

keys.name: gameMode
keys.info: One of the supported game modes.

events.name: hero_picked
events.comment: For a full list of hero names you can watch the names in the urls in DotaBuff’s website. pickConfirmed does not currently support hero swapping. If you receive a hero pick event with a pickConfirmed = true before hero swapping, this means you will not receive a new event until support is implemented. Also, pick confirmed will only happen after the pick stage, when the match is starting.

keys.name: heroName
keys.info: The name of the picked hero.

keys.name: playerIndex
keys.info: The index of the player (0 – 9, left to right).

keys.name: pickConfirmed
keys.info: True if this a finalized pick (not a random->repick pick).

events.name: daytime_changed
events.comment: Fired when the game transitions between day time and night time.

keys.name: daytime
keys.info: True if it is current day time, false otherwise.

keys.name: clock_time
keys.info: The amount of seconds from when the game clocked shows (0:00). It can be negative during the Pre-Game phase.

keys.name: nightstalker_night
keys.info: True if it is currently a Night Stalker ultimate night.

keys.name: daytime
keys.info: True if it is current day time, false otherwise.

keys.name: clock_time
keys.info: The amount of seconds from when the game clocked shows (0:00). It can be negative during the Pre-Game phase.

keys.name: nightstalker_night
keys.info: True if it is currently a Night Stalker ultimate night.

events.name: ward_purchase_cooldown_changed
events.comment: Fired every second where wards are on cooldown.

keys.name: ward_purchase_cooldown
keys.info: The cooldown, in seconds, until wards are available for purchase again.

events.name: match_ended
events.comment: When the game ends (an ancient is destroyed).

keys.name: winner
keys.info: radiant/dire

events.name: kill
events.comment: Whenever the player kills an enemy champion.

keys.name: kills
keys.info: The total number of kiils the player has.

keys.name: kill_streak
keys.info: The current number of kills without dying to an enemy champion (denying oneself does not reset this counter).

keys.name: label
keys.info: the type of kill (kill/double_kill/triple_kill/ultra_kill/rampage)

events.name: assist
events.comment: Whenever the player assists in a kill of an enemy champion.

keys.name: assists
keys.info: The total number of assists the player has.

keys.name: deaths
keys.info: The total number of deaths the player has.

events.name: cs
events.comment: Whenever the player last hits/denies non-champion units that grant creep score.

keys.name: last_hits
keys.info: The total amount of last hits (not denies) the player has.

keys.name: denies
keys.info: The total amount of denies the player has.

keys.name: type
keys.info: last_hit/deny.

keys.name: xpm
keys.info: The current XPM.

keys.name: gpm
keys.info: The current GPM.

keys.name: gold
keys.info: The current gold.

keys.name: gold_reliable
keys.info: The reliable gold part.

keys.name: gold_unreliable
keys.info: The unreliable gold part.

keys.name: hero_level
keys.info: The current hero level.

events.name: hero_respawned
events.comment: Whenever the player respawns. This is also applicable for buying back.

events.name: hero_buyback_info_changed
events.comment: Every 4 seconds and every level up, since the buyback cost is affected by game time and player level. It will also be called every second when buyback is on cooldown.

keys.name: buyback_cost
keys.info: The gold cost to buyback

keys.name: buyback_cooldown
keys.info: The cooldown remaining for buyback to become available.

keys.name: buyback_cooldown
keys.info: The cooldown remaining for buyback to become available.

events.name: hero_health_mana_info
events.comment: Whenever either of the players mana, health, max mana or max health changes.

keys.name: health
keys.info: The current health.

keys.name: max_health
keys.info: The current maximal health.

keys.name: mana
keys.info: The current mana.

keys.name: max_mana
keys.info: The current maximal mana.

events.name: hero_status_effect_changed
events.comment: Whenever any of these effects changes.

keys.name: silenced
keys.info: True if the player is silenced, false otherwise.

keys.name: stunned
keys.info: True if the player is stunned, false otherwise.

keys.name: disarmed
keys.info: True if the player is disarmed, false otherwise.

keys.name: magicimmune
keys.info: True if the player is magic immune, false otherwise.

keys.name: hexed
keys.info: True if the player is hexed, false otherwise.

keys.name: muted
keys.info: True if the player is muted, false otherwise.

keys.name: break
keys.info: True if the player is broken, false otherwise.

keys.name: has_debuff
keys.info: True if the player is affected by any debuff, false otherwise.

events.name: hero_attributes_skilled
events.comment: Whenever the player skills up his attributes.

keys.name: attributes_level
keys.info: The current level of the player’s attributes.

events.name: hero_ability_skilled
events.comment: Whenever the player skills up an ability.

keys.name: slot
keys.info: The index of the ability slot (0 – 5, left to right)

keys.name: name
keys.info: The name of the ability.

keys.name: level
keys.info: The current level of the ability.

keys.name: can_cast
keys.info: True unless the ability is not skilled, there’s not enough mana to cast it, the player is silenced, or is on cooldown.

keys.name: passive
keys.info: True if the ability is passive.

keys.name: ability_active
keys.info: Unknown, TBD.

keys.name: cooldown
keys.info: The remaining cooldown until the ability is ready to cast.

keys.name: ultimate
keys.info: True if the ability is an ultimate ability.

events.name: hero_ability_used
events.comment: Whenever the player uses an ability.

keys.name: slot
keys.info: The index of the ability slot (0 – 5, left to right)

keys.name: name
keys.info: The name of the ability.

keys.name: level
keys.info: The current level of the ability.

keys.name: can_cast
keys.info: True unless the ability is not skilled, there’s not enough mana to cast it, the player is silenced, or is on cooldown.

keys.name: passive
keys.info: True if the ability is passive.

keys.name: ability_active
keys.info: Unknown, TBD.

keys.name: cooldown
keys.info: The remaining cooldown until the ability is ready to cast.

keys.name: ultimate
keys.info: True if the ability is an ultimate ability.

events.name: hero_item_changed
events.comment: Whenever the item name in some hero/stash slot changes. This would mean that swapping items will trigger 2 events, one for each item.

keys.name: slot
keys.info: The index of the item slot (0 – 5, top row from the left to bottom row from the right)

keys.name: location
keys.info: hero/stash

keys.name: name
keys.info: The name of the item.

keys.name: passive
keys.info: True if the item is passive.

keys.name: can_cast
keys.info: True unless there’s not enough mana to use the item, the player is muted, or when the item is on cooldown. (only when passive = false)

keys.name: cooldown
keys.info: The remaining cooldown until the item is ready to be used. (only when passive = false)

keys.name: charges
keys.info: The remaining charges of the item (only when passive = false and where item can be charged)

events.name: hero_item_used
events.comment: Whenever an item is used – Essentially this means when the item goes on cooldown.

keys.name: slot
keys.info: The index of the item slot (0 – 5, top row from the left to bottom row from the right)

keys.name: location
keys.info: hero/stash

keys.name: name
keys.info: The name of the item.

keys.name: passive
keys.info: True if the item is passive.

keys.name: can_cast
keys.info: True unless there’s not enough mana to use the item, the player is muted, or when the item is on cooldown. (only when passive = false)

keys.name: cooldown
keys.info: The remaining cooldown until the item is ready to be used. (only when passive = false)

keys.name: charges
keys.info: The remaining charges of the item (only when passive = false and where item can be charged)
